name: Jennyvive My Princess
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: You are My Princess the light in my life. Never let it dim. Keep shining with your warm smile, okayy?;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthdayy My Baby, i wish bla bla bla(on ig)
text2: That's what I want to do
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
